name: Seafoam Shawl
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Merfolk/New Racial Rules/Merfolk Magic Items/Seafoam Shawl

Construction.Requirements: Craft Wondrous Item, fins to feet

sections.body: This shawl of delicate lace grants the benefits of the fins to feet spell (see below) once per day.
